entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.content:

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Raider Mk. 3Ôºö$12.99
  • Raider Mk. 2Ôºö$11.99
  • Raider Mk. 1Ôºö$0.99

Application Description

All in one app for an Interactive Map, Loot locations, Material list and breakdown list, Arc drop list, guides and quest-line guides. NOT affiliated with Embark. Raiders Map is the best tool for easy access to everything, along with world class support. You can reach me directly on X for help or to report any issues: All4nDev, or through discord. Not affiliated with embark. Raiders Map is independently owned and managed. apple standard EULhttp://www.apple.com/legal/itunes/appstore/dev/stdeulaA

entry.title: Eco inc. Save the Earth
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • +2026 boosters ECO-Initiative!Ôºö$4.99 ‚Üí $4.29 [$4.29 ~ $4.99]
  • +444! Triple-Four Booster PackÔºö$2.29 ‚Üí $2.00 [$2.00 ~ $2.29]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.29

In-App Purchases

  • +100 boosters ECO-Initiative!Ôºö$1.00
  • +2026 boosters ECO-Initiative!Ôºö$4.29
  • +444! Triple-Four Booster PackÔºö$2.00

Application Description

Eco Inc. challenges you with a variety of environmental scenarios ‚Äî from easy to nearly impossible. Your mission is to stabilize Earth's ecosystems and improve the environmental situation on the planet. Every action matters ‚Äî your decisions shape the planet‚Äôs future. Your care leads Earth towards harmony and green development. Game Features: ‚Ä¢ Develop environmental initiatives ‚Ä¢ Discover animals from the IUCN Red List ‚Ä¢ Diverse gameplay mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy ‚Ä¢ Challenging tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic skills ‚Ä¢ Make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising eco-awareness ‚Ä¢ Don‚Äôt let an ecological disaster spread across the world like a plague ‚Ä¢ Strategic planning: create long-term plans ‚Ä¢ Volunteering: send your heroes to help, participate in international projects ‚Ä¢ Economic development: manage resources, invest in new technologies, and build a green future Game information is based on open data, the IUCN Red List, and global eco-communities. We have great plans for future updates! Eco Inc. Save the Earth ‚Äî strategy sandbox in the ‚ÄúIncs‚Äù genre from the creators of Religion Inc. Share your ideas and feedback in the comments ‚Äî together with GameFirst, we‚Äôll make the game even better!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Trackless Links Pro
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$19.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $19.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$4.99

Application Description

Take back control of your browsing experience. Trackless Links Pro is the universal Safari extension for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that removes tracking parameters, enables custom redirects, and gives you control over website behaviors. UNIVERSAL PURCHASE - ONE APP, ALL YOUR DEVICES Buy once and enjoy Trackless Links Pro on iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Your settings sync seamlessly via iCloud - start on your Mac and continue on your iPhone or iPad without missing a beat. WHAT IT DOES ‚Ä¢ Removes tracking parameters (utm_*, fbclid, gclid, etc.) before they follow you around ‚Ä¢ Custom redirects (e.g. reddit ‚Üí old.reddit) with plain text or regex patterns ‚Ä¢ Share Sheet integration - open links from any app to clean or archive them ‚Ä¢ Quick access to archived web pages via Wayback Machine and other services ‚Ä¢ Optional tweaks: stop autoplay, restore text selection, prevent exit popups, and more WHY IT'S USEFUL Cleaner links are easier to share. Redirects save time. Archive access finds cached versions of changed pages. Everything runs locally - no accounts, no data collection, no external services. TRACKING BLOCKER Removes common tracking parameters on the fly. Nothing leaves your devices. URL REDIRECTS Create and reorder custom rules. Includes 20+ predefined redirects focusing on privacy and alternative frontends (Reddit, Twitter/X, YouTube, Medium, and more). Disable or enable individually. Regex supported. SEARCH ARCHIVE One-tap access to cached web page snapshots via Wayback Machine. Access from the extension popup on any device. iCLOUD SYNC Keep settings synchronized across all devices. Filters, redirects, tweaks, and statistics sync automatically. Set it up once - your preferences follow you everywhere. BROWSER TWEAKS Selective opt-in controls: copy/select unlock, autoplay block, playback speed lock, PiP enable, URL clean-on-copy, redirector bypass, cookie banner suppression (experimental), dark mode, zoom limit removal, animation reduction, and more. Configure once, works everywhere. KEY FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Universal Purchase - one price for iPhone, iPad, and Mac ‚Ä¢ Complete privacy - everything runs on your devices (zero data collection) ‚Ä¢ Native apps for iOS, iPadOS, and macOS with full feature parity ‚Ä¢ Seamless iCloud sync keeps everything synchronized automatically ‚Ä¢ Share from anywhere - open links from Reddit, X, and other apps ‚Ä¢ Fully customizable with personal filter and redirect rules ‚Ä¢ Advanced pattern matching with regex support for power users ‚Ä¢ Lightning-fast execution that loads before pages finish rendering ‚Ä¢ Ultra-lightweight with no battery drain or background activity ‚Ä¢ Works offline - no internet connection required DESIGN PRINCIPLES Plain language. User control. No dark patterns. Opt-in for anything that might change page behavior. One purchase, all platforms. IMPORTANT NOTES Tweaks may not work on all websites due to varying designs and security policies. All tweaks can be disabled if they cause issues. Cookie banner management is experimental. SUPPORT & FEEDBACK Bug reports and feature requests: https://github.com/aloth/trackless-links/issues PRIVACY No tracking, analytics, remote calls, or data retention. Everything runs on-device. EULA Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/ READY FOR CLEANER BROWSING EVERYWHERE? Download Trackless Links Pro - fast, private, and on your terms.

entry.title: Home, Planet & Hunters
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Monthly CardÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.49 [$2.49 ~ $4.99]
  • Professional TrainingÔºö$14.99 ‚Üí $7.49 [$7.49 ~ $14.99]
  • Special TrainingÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $9.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.29

In-App Purchases

  • Double Combat RewardsÔºö$1.99
  • 300 GoldÔºö$4.99
  • 60 GoldÔºö$0.99
  • 680 GoldÔºö$9.99
  • Monthly CardÔºö$2.49
  • Professional TrainingÔºö$7.49
  • Backpack ExpansionÔºö$1.99
  • 120 GoldÔºö$1.99
  • 980 GoldÔºö$14.99
  • Special TrainingÔºö$4.99

Application Description

== Featured in the App Store in 160 countries and regions. == == Repeatedly recommended as Game of the Day in the App Store. == In the distant "Planet", planets burst and civilizations collapse. The residents who lost their "Home" wander above within The Ring. For survival and hope, a group of "Hunters" gather, embarking on an exploration and mission across the shattered continents... ‚Äî Will you become the hunter or the hunted? Your battle decides the future of the planet! ** Game Features ** - Retro and refined pixel style, returning to the "original intention". - Control three characters in real-time for exhilarating combat! - Pixel characters + full body part customization, appearance changes with gear! - Skill combinations + elemental Combos, diverse strategic options! - Classic gear matching + Set skills activation, great Hunters have more than one trick! - No "Energy" limits + unlimited Resource gathering, truly free exploration. - Bizarre Monsters + immensely powerful giant beast Bosses, a challenging adventure on an alien Planet! - Rich character stories + diverse in-depth development, 8+ Hunters take you roaming through the Planet! ------ A Word from the Developers ------ It's been 5 years since the release of our last game "Brutal Street 2" "Creation" is not easy, and innovating while continuing the legacy is even harder, "Home, Planet, and Hunter" has been a labor of love, and we hope you'll like it. From: The 12 buddies at Black Pearl Games Follow us on social media: https://discord.gg/QYpbhswpZu Facebook: www.facebook.com/BlackPearlGames X/twitter: twitter.com/bpgames321 Ins: www.instagram.com/blackpearlgames Threads: www.threads.net/@blackpearlgames

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: LUCH: Photo Effects & Filters
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.29 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $0.59]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

LUCH Films is a modern app for giving images the effect of film photography. Try unique bokeh effects, light leaks, noise and dust effects, and original filters. 20+ HANDMADE FILTERS The application has over 20 different filters made by hand by a professional photographer. They are universal and made for various kinds of photos and colors, imitating the effects film KODAK and ILFORD. FILM FRAMES FOR INSTAGRAM STORY AND FEED We have adapted film frames for modern screen formats and added them to the application so that the warmth of film photography will always remain in our hearts and minds. DUST EFFECT Making a shabby photo is easy. You don't have to wait 20 years, you just have to choose one of 35 effects. LIGHT LEAKS You know these old light leaks shots that we loved to look at as children. We simulated the same light flashes in the LUCH FILMS. BOKEH EFFECT If you love bokeh as much as we do, then you should definitely love it. Choose from 35 bokeh and prism effects. NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO IN-APP PURCHASES Take full control over your image, apply unique filters developed in collaboration with photographers. Create unique photos including new layers. Over 90 effects. The ability to apply noise and dust effects, light leaks, bokeh and prism effects to the image. You can choose the size of the image for a stream or story, which is ideal for Instagram or other social networks. Film frames are also included in the LUCH Films. Follow @luchfilmsapp on Instagram for inspiration from our community of users. We love hearing your ideas and feedback. Please email hello@vostokapp.ru or DM us on Instagram at @luchfilmsapp for questions or suggestions.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Thumper: Pocket Edition
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

Application Description

*** Winner of Apple Design Award 2019 *** Thumper is rhythm violence: classic action, blistering speed, and brutal physicality. You are a space beetle. Brave the void and confront a maniacal giant head. With this special pocket edition, you can play all nine epic levels with one hand. Hurtle forward, master new moves, and survive terrifying boss battles. Propelled by a pounding original soundtrack, you'll feel every crushing impact. To reach synesthetic bliss, you must conquer rhythm hell. ‚ñ† Features ‚ñ† „Éª Nine epic levels „Éª Adrenalizing boss battles „Éª Psychedelic visuals and original soundtrack „Éª Smooth 60 FPS in portrait and landscape (and up to 120 FPS on supported devices) „Éª PLAY + mode (increased challenge and speed) „Éª Full screen display on iPhone X „Éª iCloud Sync ‚ñ† Please Note ‚ñ† Wireless headphones can add significant audio latency. For the best experience, wired headphones or integrated speakers are strongly recommended.

entry.title: Pasha Planet: Reborn
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$0.99 ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

‚ÄúPasha Planet: Reborn‚Äù is the debut game of Scorpio Game, a Taiwanese independent game development studio. Prepare to be charmed by unique hand-painted scenes and have fun with light detective work, players will get to explore the main game plot that revolves around the characters‚Äô daily life through an immersive and one-of-a-kind puzzle-solving gameplay. [Game Overview] The story takes place on the distant planet of Pasha. A prosperous underground city, which are inhabited by adorable doggies, can be found there. They live in peace day after day, enjoying the convenience brought about by technology. However, the protagonist Bobbie, who grew up in the city, often fantasizes about getting out of the closed-off Underground City to see the world outside. This is where the main story line of the game begins. Players will take on the role of Bobbie and explore the seemingly calm and peaceful city, which is in actual fact, facing an energy crisis. Players must clear stages of challenges to solve the final mystery and figure out a way to save all the inhabitants before disaster strikes! [Game Features] - Created by an independent game development studio in Taiwan. - Classic click-and-point puzzle-solving gameplay. - Charming and heartwarming hand-painted scenes. - Challenging puzzles and stages.

entry.title: Hyper Light Drifter
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.49 [$2.49 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.49

Application Description

Finally, Heart Machine's award winning slash-'em-up arrives to iOS in the most polished and refined version yet, the Special Edition. ‚ñ∫ Winner of the Audience Award and Excellence in Visual Art awards of the prestigious Independent Games Festival. ‚ñ∫ 14 + nominations among the Best Visual Design, Best Audio and Best original Game categories. ‚ñ∫ 9/10 Destructoid - A hallmark of excellence. There may be flaws, but they are negligible and won't cause massive damage. ‚ñ∫ 9.5/10 Game Informer - The combination of soundtrack, art, and combat creates a rabbit hole worth your full exploration. ‚ñ∫ Eurogamer Recommended - Heart Machine's slash-'em-up is punishing and precise - and incredibly beautiful. ‚ñ∫ 9/10 GameSpot - It is more than simply pretty; Hyper Light Drifter uses its visuals to both guide and relax you. The grandest vistas calm your pulse between difficult, breathless combat sequences. ‚ñ∫ 8.5 Polygon - Hyper Light Drifter deftly mixes contemplative moments with breakneck action. ‚ñ∫ 5 Stars Darkstation - The top-down action-RPG Hyper Light Drifter is an amazing game: gorgeous, a fascinating world to explore, tight controls, beautiful music, and the faith in the player for you to figure things out on your own. Echoes of a dark and violent past resonate throughout a savage land, steeped in treasure and blood. Drifters of this world are the collectors of forgotten knowledge, lost technologies and broken histories. Our Drifter is haunted by an insatiable illness, traveling further into the lands of Buried Time, hoping to discover a way to quiet the vicious disease. Hyper Light Drifter is an action adventure RPG in the vein of the best 16-bit classics, with modernized mechanics and designs on a much grander scale. Explore a beautiful, vast and ruined world riddled with dangers and lost technologies. Features: ‚óè 120 fps gameplay on iPad Pro / 60 fps on iPhone and iPad. ‚óè Compatible with MFi controllers. ‚óè Game Center achievements. ‚óè Haptic Vibration. ‚óè From each character to subtle background elements, everything is lovingly hand-animated. ‚óè Easy to pick up, difficult to master; enemies are vicious and numerous, hazards will easily crush your frail body, and friendly faces remain rare. ‚óè Upgrade weapons, learn new skills, discover equipment and traverse a dark, detailed world with branching paths and secrets abound. ‚óè Evocative soundtrack composed by Disasterpeace. ‚óè All the content from the original game + more weapons, enemies and areas from the Special edition.

Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

Application Description

A desperate letter summons detective Paul Trilby to a peculiar island town, divided by a wall and ruled by a Hospital. Regular citizens get admitted and then return without their memories. A sinister conspiracy is afoot. Can you get to the bottom of this mystery? Use wit, curiosity and lateral thinking to puzzle your way towards a solution, helped by the local citizens you meet along the way. Remember that there is always a grain of truth in the local gossip. Follow the Meaning is a surreal, hand-drawn, point-and-click adventure inspired by classic titles like Samorost and the Rusty Lake series. Features ‚ñ† Hand-drawn art brings the offbeat world to life ‚ñ† Whimsical worldbuilding with a sinister undertone ‚ñ† Atmospheric soundtrack by Victor Butzelaar ‚ñ† A twisted mystery that awaits your diligent inspection ‚ñ† 1.5 hours average playtime

-- From the makers of the award-winning Just Press Record! -- Calling all music, dance and fitness enthusiasts‚Ä¶ and absolutely anyone who wants to change the tempo of their favourite songs without affecting pitch or fidelity! Perfect Tempo is the only app you‚Äôll ever need to speed up or slow down over 100 million songs on Apple Music, in your Music app or Files app. Create unlimited playlists and, if you have an Apple Watch, control playback from your wrist for the ultimate convenience! Perfect!! PICK ANY SONG ‚Ä¢ Change the tempo of any song on Apple Music, in your Music app or Files app without affecting pitch or fidelity ‚Ä¢ Access the entire Apple Music catalog of over 100 million songs! ‚Ä¢ Play tracks from Cloud Drive, Dropbox and other cloud services ‚Ä¢ Quick access to your recently played songs ADJUST THE TEMPO ‚Ä¢ A simple slider for adjusting tempo ‚Ä¢ Select any tempo from -50% to +100%, in 1% increments ‚Ä¢ Easily revert to the original tempo with just one tap ‚Ä¢ App will remember your chosen tempo until you want to adjust it again CREATE SETLISTS ‚Ä¢ Create unlimited Setlists ‚Ä¢ Name your Setlists to find them easily later ‚Ä¢ Continuous play from one song to the next ‚Ä¢ Set and remember different tempos for different songs ‚Ä¢ Combine songs from Apple Music, your Music app and Files app all in the same Setlist ‚Ä¢ Create Setlists from existing albums and playlists in your Music app or on Apple Music REPEAT JUST ONE SECTION ‚Ä¢ Select and change the tempo of just one section of a song and then loop it to make practise easy ‚Ä¢ Add sections of a song to a Setlist multiple times and then play them back at different tempos APPLE WATCH ‚Ä¢ Easily control playback, tempo and volume from your wrist AIRPLAY ‚Ä¢ AirPlay support for output to wireless speakers or Apple TV AND MORE ‚Ä¢ Support for Dark Mode ‚Ä¢ Change the key (transpose up or down) of locally stored DRM-free songs imported into the app or from your Music app. (Missing the pitch controls from the last version? Re-enable them in the Settings app > Perfect Tempo. Then swipe left on the album artwork when playing a song) IMPORTANT! * Songs from streaming services other than Apple Music are not supported *

entry.title: Just Press Record
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $3.49 [$3.49 ~ $6.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$3.49

Application Description

Just Press Record is the ultimate audio recorder bringing one tap recording, transcription and iCloud syncing to all your devices. You can edit your audio and transcriptions right inside the app and even start a new recording completely hands-free with Siri! Life is full of moments we would rather not forget - like your child‚Äôs first words, an important meeting or spontaneous idea. Capture these moments effortlessly on iPhone, iPad, Mac or for ultimate convenience, Apple Watch. RECORD ‚Ä¢ One tap to start, stop, pause and resume recording. ‚Ä¢ Start and stop recording from the Lock Screen, Control Centre, the Action Button, Shortcuts, Siri, the Widget, a 3D Touch Quick Action or via the URL scheme. ‚Ä¢ Unlimited recording time. ‚Ä¢ Record discretely in the background. ‚Ä¢ Choose to record from the built-in mic, AirPods or external microphones. ‚Ä¢ Record independently on Apple Watch and sync later. PLAY ‚Ä¢ Seek backwards and forwards during playback. ‚Ä¢ Adjustable playback speed. TRANSCRIBE ‚Ä¢ Turn speech into searchable text. ‚Ä¢ Support for over 30 languages, independent of your device's language setting. ‚Ä¢ Synchronized text highlighting and audio playback. ‚Ä¢ Format as you record with punctuation commands. EDIT ‚Ä¢ Audio - visualise your audio in the waveform view and cut out the parts you don‚Äôt need. ‚Ä¢ Text - make corrections and add new text to your transcriptions. SHARE ‚Ä¢ Share audio and text to other apps. ‚Ä¢ Share easily to social media as a video clip. ‚Ä¢ Share to iTunes on Mac or PC via USB cable. ‚Ä¢ Print a hard copy of your transcripts. ‚Ä¢ Share audio files from other apps to Just Press Record. ORGANISATION ‚Ä¢ View recent recordings or browse your library by date and time. ‚Ä¢ Search by filename or transcription content. ‚Ä¢ Dedicated tab for quick access to recordings made on Apple Watch. ‚Ä¢ Rename recordings. ‚Ä¢ Slide Over and Split View support on iPad. ‚Ä¢ Add a badge to the app icon showing the number of unplayed recordings. STORAGE ‚Ä¢ Choose to store recordings in iCloud Drive or locally on-device. ‚Ä¢ Recordings stored in iCloud Drive automatically sync across all your devices. ‚Ä¢ Recordings stored locally benefit from Files app integration and automatic iTunes File Sharing. ‚Ä¢ Transcriptions are stored within the audio file. PRO-AUDIO ‚Ä¢ Support for stereo recording from the built-in microphone on supported devices. ‚Ä¢ Support for high quality external microphones connected via the Lightning Port. ‚Ä¢ Customisable Audio Settings to enhance your recording experience. ‚Ä¢ File types include WAV, AIF or standard iTunes M4A (ACC). ‚Ä¢ High quality audio up to 96kHz / 24-bit. ACCESSIBILITY ‚Ä¢ VoiceOver support throughout the app. ‚Ä¢ Magic Tap gesture to start / stop a recording. APPLE WATCH Just Press Record includes an Apple Watch app that gives you the freedom to record anywhere, even when your iPhone is not around. ‚Ä¢ Start recording with a single tap on the Complication. ‚Ä¢ Record discretely in the background. ‚Ä¢ Unlimited recording time. ‚Ä¢ Recordings automatically transfer to iPhone for transcription and iCloud syncing. ‚Ä¢ Listen to recent recordings through the built-in speaker or AirPods. ‚Ä¢ Adjust volume with the Digital Crown. ‚Ä¢ Pause recording with a downward swipe. ‚Ä¢ Accessibility support with VoiceOver, reduced motion and support for the extra large Complication template. IMPORTANT: ‚Ä¢ Just Press Record does not record phone calls or audio from other apps. ‚Ä¢ Transcription requires a good, clean audio signal. Avoid recording in noisy environments and ensure the microphone is positioned close to the source. ‚Ä¢ URL scheme implemented by Just Press Record can be found on our FAQ page.

Mayor Card fuses classic city-management simulation with lightning-fast swipe-card action to create a fresh strategy deck-builder. entry.title: Dungeon and Puzzles
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

-- Awards: ‚óè 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT: Official Selection ‚óè Busan Indie Connect 2020: Excellence in Casual ‚óè Bahamut 2020 ACG Creation Contest: Bronze Award About: Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves. There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms. To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move. Features: ‚óè Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban ‚óè 150 handcrafted rooms ‚óè Fantasy themed pixel art ‚óè Non-linear dungeon map -- ‚óè Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/nekolyst ‚óè Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/Nekolyst ‚óè Join our Discord server https://discord.gg/A7Sss9d

Application Description

Acrobits Groundwire: Elevate Your Communication Acrobits, a leader in UCaaS and communication solutions for over 20 years, proudly introduces the Acrobits Groundwire softphone. This top-tier SIP softphone client offers unmatched voice and video call clarity. A softphone designed for both personal and professional use, it seamlessly integrates quality communication with an intuitive interface. IMPORTANT, PLEASE READ Groundwire is a SIP Client, not a VoIP service. You must have service with a VoIP provider or PBX that supports use on a standard SIP client to use it. Choosing the Best Softphone App Experience robust communication with a leading SIP softphone application. Preconfigured for major VoIP providers, this softphone app guarantees high-quality, secure, and intuitive calling. Perfect for maintaining connections with friends, family, and colleagues, maximizing all aspects of your VoIP experience. Key Features of the SIP Softphone - Exceptional Audio Quality: Enjoy crystal clear audio with support for multiple formats including Opus and G.729. - HD Video Calls: Conduct up to 720p HD video calls, supported by H.264 and VP8. - Robust Security: Our SIP softphone app ensures private conversations with military-grade encryption. - Battery Efficiency: Thanks to our efficient push notifications, you can stay connected with minimal battery drain. - Seamless Call Transition: Our VoIP dialer smoothly switches between WiFi and data plans during calls. - Softphone Customization: Tailor your SIP settings, UI, and ringtones. - 5G and Multi-Device Support: Ready for the future, compatible with most mobile operating systems. Other features included on this robust app include: instant messaging, attended and unattended transfers, group calls, voicemail, and extensive customization for each SIP account. More Than Just a VoIP Softphone Dialer Groundwire softphone offers more than the standard VoIP dialer experience. It‚Äôs a comprehensive tool for crystal clear Wi-Fi calling, equipped with robust business VoIP dialer features. It offers a secure and reliable softphone choice with no hidden fees and a one-time cost. Leverage SIP technology for improved call quality. Make this softphone your first choice for dependable, and easy SIP communication. Download a feature-rich and modern SIP softphone now and be part of a community enjoying the best in voice and SIP calling. Transform your daily communication with our exceptional VoIP softphone app.

Built specifically for iOS, MagicKit AI brings together essential features while maintaining your privacy and battery life. Device and System Tools ‚Ä¢ Battery Status: View current charge level and charging state ‚Ä¢ Storage Usage: Analyze available and used storage ‚Ä¢ Device Info: Check basic hardware and system details ‚Ä¢ Uptime Tracker: Monitor how long your device has been running ‚Ä¢ Battery Tips: Get practical advice to improve battery usage ‚Ä¢ Photo Cleaner: Detect and remove duplicate or similar photos to free up space ‚Ä¢ Contact Cleaner: Organize contacts by finding duplicates and incomplete entries ‚Ä¢ RAM Manager: Monitor memory usage and optimize performance ‚Ä¢ Device Benchmark: Test CPU, GPU, memory, and network performance Network Tools ‚Ä¢ Speed Test: Measure internet connection speed ‚Ä¢ Wi-Fi Info: See network name, IP address, and connection status ‚Ä¢ IP Lookup: Check geolocation of public IP addresses ‚Ä¢ Location Info: Track GPS location, speed, direction, and altitude Security & Privacy Tools ‚Ä¢ Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options ‚Ä¢ Passphrase Generator: Generate memorable and secure passphrases ‚Ä¢ UUID Generator: Create unique identifiers in various formats ‚Ä¢ Secure PIN Generator: Generate secure PIN codes with multiple exchange rates for fiat and cryptocurrencies ‚Ä¢ Date Time Calculator: Calculate differences between dates with business days support ‚Ä¢ Time Zone Converter: Convert time across various time zones direction and level using device sensors ‚Ä¢ Orientation Lock: Lock screen orientation while using the app ‚Ä¢ Audio Meter: Measure surrounding sound levels using the microphone ‚Ä¢ Clipboard Manager: Access and manage copied text within the app session ‚Ä¢ Flashlight & Brightness: Turn on the device flashlight and adjust screen brightness ‚Ä¢ Note Taker: Create, organize, and manage notes with categories and iCloud backup ‚Ä¢ Universal Generator: Generate random data including text, numbers, dates, and more ‚Ä¢ Color Palettes Studio: Create, extract, and manage beautiful color palettes from images or manually using color pickers ‚Äî perfect for designers and creatives Highlights ‚Ä¢ Clean and user-friendly interface with new wizard-based tools ‚Ä¢ Featured Tools section showcasing the most popular utilities ‚Ä¢ No ads or in-app purchases ‚Ä¢ Lightweight and battery-efficient ‚Ä¢ Compatible with all iOS devices ‚Ä¢ Frequent updates with new tools ‚Ä¢ Built with privacy and performance in mind ‚Ä¢ Dark/Light theme support with smooth animations Perfect for ‚Ä¢ Device monitoring and optimization ‚Ä¢ Everyday measurement and conversion tasks ‚Ä¢ Scanning documents and QR codes ‚Ä¢ Cleaning up photo storage and contacts ‚Ä¢ Creating and managing countdowns with reminders ‚Ä¢ Tracking habits and progress with multiple counters ‚Ä¢ Accessing quick tools like flashlight and brightness control ‚Ä¢ Performing simple network diagnostics ‚Ä¢ Generating secure passwords and managing privacy ‚Ä¢ Taking quick notes and organizing information ‚Ä¢ Designing and managing color entry.title: Wall of insanity

Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.89 [$0.39 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.89

Application Description

Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series. It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world. You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless. Story: A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins... Key Features: - Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world. - A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go? - A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition. And your life. - Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed. Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds. - Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.
